trans-unit.source: Runs multiple instances of a child activity.
trans-unit.target: 자식 활동의 여러 인스턴스를 실행 합니다.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] The ReplicatorActivity is similar to a `for each` statement in code.
If you are presented with a task in which you repeat the same function on many different entities, ReplicatorActivity may be a better solution than <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WhileActivity>.
trans-unit.target: ReplicatorActivity <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WhileActivity>.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WhileActivity> 보다 나은 솔루션 일 수 있습니다에 다른 여러 엔티티에 같은 함수를 반복 하는 작업이 표시 되는 경우

trans-unit.source: By default, a ReplicatorActivity is completed when all child instances have completed.
trans-unit.target: 기본적으로는 ReplicatorActivity에는 모든 자식 인스턴스가 완료 되 면 완료 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: You can override this behavior with a custom condition to use when the activity finishes.
trans-unit.target: 사용자 지정 조건 작업을 마쳤을 때 사용할이 동작을 재정의할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: If this condition evaluates to `true` before all child instances have completed, then any running incomplete child instances are canceled.
trans-unit.target: 이 조건은로 평가 되 면 `true` 모든 자식 항목 전에 인스턴스를 완료 한 다음 실행이 완료 되지 하위 인스턴스를 모두 취소 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ReplicatorActivity"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ReplicatorActivity"></xref> class using the name of the activity.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ReplicatorActivity"> </xref> 클래스 활동의 이름을 사용 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The user-defined name of the activity.
Gets a value that indicates whether all child instances are complete.
trans-unit.target: 모든 자식 인스턴스가 완료 되었는지 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: This property allows the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ReplicatorActivity.UntilCondition%2A> writer an easy way to get this information without having to maintain their own collection or evaluate over a dynamic activity set.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성을 사용 하면는 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ReplicatorActivity.UntilCondition%2A>작성기가 자신의 컬렉션을 유지 관리 하거나 동적 활동 설정을 확인 하지 않고도이 정보를 얻을 수 있는 간편한 방법.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ReplicatorActivity.UntilCondition%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if all child instances are complete; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>모든 자식 인스턴스가 완료 되 면 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
To be added.
Occurs immediately after the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ReplicatorActivity"></xref> finishes running a child activity instance.
trans-unit.target: 바로 뒤에 오는 <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ReplicatorActivity"> </xref> 자식 실행이 완료 된 작업 인스턴스입니다.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
Occurs when the child activity instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ReplicatorActivity"></xref> has completed.
trans-unit.target: 발생 경우의 자식 활동 인스턴스는 <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ReplicatorActivity"> </xref> 완료 되었습니다.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
Occurs immediately after a child activity is initialized.
trans-unit.target: 자식 활동이 초기화 되는 직후에 발생 합니다.

trans-unit.source: If subscribed to, this event is raised every time that an instance of the child activity is created for an item in the `Children` collection.
trans-unit.target: 구독 하는 경우이 이벤트는 항목에 대해 자식 활동의 인스턴스가 만들어질 때마다는 `Children` 컬렉션입니다.

trans-unit.source: The `Children` collection is set through the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ReplicatorChildEventArgs> of the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ReplicatorActivity.Initialized> event handler.
The child <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity> instance is passed in the call so that the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ReplicatorActivity> can set values on the child.
trans-unit.target: 자식 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity>인스턴스가 호출에 전달 됩니다 되도록는 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ReplicatorActivity>자식 요소에서 값을 설정할 수 있습니다.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ReplicatorActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity>

trans-unit.source: The relevant <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ReplicatorChildEventArgs.InstanceData%2A> object from the `Children` collection is also passed.
To be added.
Occurs when the child activity instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ReplicatorActivity"></xref> has initialized.
trans-unit.target: 발생 경우의 자식 활동 인스턴스는 <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ReplicatorActivity"> </xref> 가 초기화 합니다.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
Occurs when the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ReplicatorActivity"></xref> completes.
To be added.
Occurs when the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ReplicatorActivity"></xref> has completed.
To be added.
Returns a list of all child activities.
A list of all child activities.
Gets the index position of the current child activity.
trans-unit.target: 현재 자식 활동의 인덱스 위치를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: The index position of the current child activity.
Gets an array of running child activity instances.
trans-unit.target: 실행 중인 자식 활동 인스턴스의 배열을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: The activity instances returned by this property are the instances of the activity type that are contained within the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ReplicatorActivity>.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성에서 반환 되는 활동 인스턴스 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ReplicatorActivity>.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ReplicatorActivity> 내에 포함 된 활동 형식의 인스턴스는

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ReplicatorActivity> is running in sequence mode, the array contains no more than one activity; if running in parallel mode the array contains all instances that are currently running.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ReplicatorActivity>실행 되 고 순차 모드에서 배열에 둘 이상의 활동이 포함 됩니다; 병렬 모드로 실행 중인 경우 배열 현재 실행 중인 모든 인스턴스를 포함 하는.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ReplicatorActivity>

trans-unit.source: An array of currently running child activity instances.
trans-unit.target: 현재 실행 중인 자식 활동 인스턴스의 배열입니다.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
To be added.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ExecutionType"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ReplicatorActivity"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ExecutionType"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ReplicatorActivity"></xref>.
Represents the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref> that targets the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ReplicatorActivity.ExecutionType*> property.
To be added.
Gets or sets a list of child activity data.
trans-unit.target: 자식 활동 데이터 목록을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: A list of child activity data.
Represents the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref> that targets the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ReplicatorActivity.InitialChildData*> property.
To be added.
Occurs when the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ReplicatorActivity"></xref> begins to execute.
To be added.
Represents the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref> that targets the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ReplicatorActivity.Initialized"></xref> event.
To be added.
Indicates whether the specified child activity is currently executing.
trans-unit.target: 지정한 자식 활동이 현재 실행 되 고 있는지 여부를 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: The index position of the child activity.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the child activity is executing; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>자식 활동이 실행 되는 경우 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
Gets or sets a completion condition that indicates when the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ReplicatorActivity"></xref> should finish.
trans-unit.target: 시기를 나타내는 완료 조건을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.는 <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ReplicatorActivity"> </xref> 완료 해야 합니다.

trans-unit.source: This default condition is that all child instances must complete for the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ReplicatorActivity> to be completed.
trans-unit.target: 이 기본 상태는 모든 자식 인스턴스가 완료 되어야 하는 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ReplicatorActivity>를 채워야 합니다.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ReplicatorActivity>

trans-unit.source: As with a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ConditionedActivityGroup>, you can specify the completion condition using a rule condition or code condition.
trans-unit.target: 과 마찬가지로 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ConditionedActivityGroup>, 규칙 조건 또는 코드 조건을 사용 하 여 완료 조건을 지정할 수 있습니다.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ConditionedActivityGroup>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCondition"></xref> that determines whether the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ReplicatorActivity"></xref> is finished.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCondition"> </xref> 결정 하는 여부는 <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ReplicatorActivity"> </xref> 가 완료 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Represents the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref> that targets the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ReplicatorActivity.UntilCondition*> property.
To be added.
